statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%kitchen%';
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location LIKE 'Kitchen%' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY sensor_location ASC, sensor_value DESC, timestamp;
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value, MIN(sensor_value) AS min_value, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity';
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location='Room A'
SELECT sensor_id, value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE detection_algorithm='Algorithm X'
SELECT anomaly_id, anomaly_description FROM anomalies ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, value, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, location, value FROM sensors WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, anomaly_type, anomaly_description, detection_algorithm FROM sensors JOIN anomalies ON sensors.sensor_id = anomalies.sensor_id WHERE anomalies.anomaly_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' AND location IN ('Room A', 'Room B') ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;

SELECT sensor_name, anomaly_description FROM sensors JOIN anomalies ON sensors.sensor_id = anomalies.sensor_id WHERE sensors.sensor_name LIKE '%sensor%' AND anomalies.anomaly_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location, timestamp FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_description LIKE '%high%' ORDER BY anomaly_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT s.sensor_name, sd.timestamp, a.anomaly_description FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id JOIN anomalies a ON sd.data_id = a.data_id WHERE s.location = 'Lab';
SELECT s.sensor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id GROUP BY s.sensor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM monitoring_logs GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, log_message FROM monitoring_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, AI_algorithm FROM AI_models WHERE trained_date >= DATE('2022-01-01') ORDER BY trained_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp, log_message FROM sensor_data INNER JOIN monitoring_logs ON sensor_data.sensor_id = monitoring_logs.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_records WHERE anomaly_type = 'Critical' AND timestamp BETWEEN TIMESTAMP('2022-01-01 00:00:00') AND TIMESTAMP('2022-02-01 00:00:00');
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM readings WHERE reading_value > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT anomaly_details, detected_datetime FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts JOIN users ON alerts.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensors JOIN readings ON sensors.sensor_id = readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_value > 50 AND reading_datetime > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reading_value ASC, reading_datetime DESC;

SELECT anomalies.anomaly_details, readings.reading_datetime FROM anomalies JOIN readings ON anomalies.reading_id = readings.reading_id WHERE detected_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY readings.reading_datetime DESC;

SELECT sensors.sensor_name, sensors.location, AVG(readings.reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM sensors JOIN readings ON sensors.sensor_id = readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensors.sensor_name, sensors.location HAVING avg_reading_value > 30 ORDER BY avg_reading_value DESC;

SELECT users.username, alerts.alert_message FROM users JOIN alerts ON users.user_id = alerts.user_id WHERE alerts.alert_datetime > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY users.username ASC, alerts.alert_datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
